It is important to note that diversity and inclusion efforts are not necessarily geared towards improving the quality of education as such but rather towards creating a more equitable and inclusive learning environment. However, it is possible that an inclusive and diverse environment could lead to an improved educational experience for students.

In terms of educational quality, Catholic University of America is a well-respected institution that has consistently ranked highly among national universities. The university offers a wide range of academic programs, including undergraduate, graduate, and professional degrees, and is known for its strong faculty who are committed to teaching and research.

The university's focus on diversity and inclusion is not just about creating a more welcoming environment but also about better preparing students for a diverse, globalized world. By exposing students to a range of perspectives and experiences, the university aims to equip them with the knowledge and skills to succeed in an increasingly diverse society.

While it is difficult to quantify the impact of diversity and inclusion efforts on the quality of education, research has shown that exposure to diversity can lead to improved critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity. Therefore, it is possible that a more diverse and inclusive learning environment at Catholic University of America could lead to an improved educational experience for students.
